parameter.name: Environment
parameter.description: Enter one of the following environment values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: DJSCaseMgtContext
parameter.description: Enter a SqlClient connection string for the DJSCaseMgtContext Database Connection.

parameter.name: ELMAH DB Conn String
parameter.description: Enter the SqlClient connection string for the ELMAH error logging database.

parameter.name: ELMAH Application Name
parameter.description: Enter one of the following (matching the target environment): CORInternalSecurity, CORInternalSecurity (stage), or CORInternalSecurity (dev).

parameter.name: ELMAH Email Sender Alias
parameter.description: Enter one of the following (matching the target environment): elmah@richmondgov.com, elmah_stage@richmondgov.com, or elmah_dev@richmondgov.com.

parameter.name: ELMAH Email Recipients
parameter.description: Enter one or more semicolon-delimited email accounts or Outlook groups to receive ELMAH emails.
